CoSMoS
  • API reference
  • View page source

API reference¶

Main classes¶

cosmos.cosmos.CoSMoS()

This is the main CoSMoS class.

cosmos.cosmos_main_loop.MainLoop()

Read the scenario.toml file, determine cycle times, and run cosmos model loop.

cosmos.cosmos_model_loop.ModelLoop()

Pre-process, submit, move, and post-process all models and initialize webviewer once all models are finished.

cosmos.cosmos_model.Model()

Read generic model data from toml file, prepare model run paths, and submit jobs.

cosmos.cosmos_scenario.Scenario(name)

Scenario class to read scenario file and initialize models.

Model-specific classes¶

cosmos.cosmos_beware.CoSMoS_BEWARE()

Cosmos class for BEWARE model.

cosmos.cosmos_delft3dfm.CoSMoS_Delft3DFM()

Cosmos class for Delft3d FM model.

cosmos.cosmos_hurrywave.CoSMoS_HurryWave()

Cosmos class for HurryWave model.

cosmos.cosmos_sfincs.CoSMoS_SFINCS()

Cosmos class for SFINCS model.

cosmos.cosmos_xbeach.CoSMoS_XBeach()

Cosmos class for XBeach model.

Additional classes¶

Classes for pre-processing, running, and post-processing.

cosmos.cosmos_stations.Stations()

Cosmos observation stations.

cosmos.cosmos_webviewer.WebViewer(name)

Cosmos webviewer class

cosmos.cosmos_cluster.Cluster(name)

Conditionally run models.

cosmos.cosmos_configuration.Configuration()

CoSMoS Configuration class.

CoSMoS functions¶

cosmos.cosmos.CoSMoS.initialize(main_path, …)

Initialize CoSMoS configuration based on configuration file and input arguments.

cosmos.cosmos.CoSMoS.run(*args)

Run a CoSMoS scenario:

cosmos.cosmos.CoSMoS.stop()

Stop main loop and model loop.

cosmos.cosmos.CoSMoS.log(message)

Write log message to cosmos.log

cosmos.cosmos.CoSMoS.make_webviewer(sc_name, …)

Just make webviewer

cosmos.cosmos.CoSMoS.post_process(sc_name[, …])

Just post-process model results.

MainLoop and ModelLoop functions¶

cosmos.cosmos_main_loop.MainLoop.run()

Run main loop.

cosmos.cosmos_main_loop.MainLoop.start([cycle])

Read the scenario.toml file, determine cycle times, and start cosmos_main_loop.run with scheduler.

cosmos.cosmos_model_loop.ModelLoop.run()

Run all cosmos models defined in the scenario file.

cosmos.cosmos_model_loop.ModelLoop.start()

Start cosmos_model_loop.run with scheduler.

cosmos.cosmos_model_loop.ModelLoop.stop()

Stop cosmos_model_loop.

Model functions¶

cosmos.cosmos_model.Model.read_generic()

Read model attributes from model.toml file.

cosmos.cosmos_model.Model.set_paths()

Set model paths (input, output, figures, restart, job).

cosmos.cosmos_model.Model.get_nested_models()

Get which model the current model is nested in.

cosmos.cosmos_model.Model.submit_job()

Submit model.

cosmos.cosmos_model.Model.get_all_nested_models(tp)

Return a list of all models nested in this model.

cosmos.cosmos_model.Model.add_stations(name)

Add stations that are located within this model.

cosmos.cosmos_model.Model.get_peak_boundary_conditions()

Get boundary conditions from overall model and define peak.

cosmos.cosmos_beware.CoSMoS_BEWARE.read_model_specific()

Read BEWARE specific model attributes.

cosmos.cosmos_beware.CoSMoS_BEWARE.pre_process()

Preprocess BEWARE model.

cosmos.cosmos_beware.CoSMoS_BEWARE.move()

Move BEWARE model input and output files.

cosmos.cosmos_beware.CoSMoS_BEWARE.post_process()

Post-process BEWARE output: generate (probabilistic) runup timeseries.

cosmos.cosmos_sfincs.CoSMoS_SFINCS.read_model_specific()

Read SFINCS specific model attributes.

cosmos.cosmos_sfincs.CoSMoS_SFINCS.pre_process()

Preprocess SFINCS model.

cosmos.cosmos_sfincs.CoSMoS_SFINCS.move()

Move SFINCS model input, output, and restart files.

cosmos.cosmos_sfincs.CoSMoS_SFINCS.post_process()

Post-process SFINCS output: generate (probabilistic) water level timeseries and flood maps.

cosmos.cosmos_delft3dfm.CoSMoS_Delft3DFM.read_model_specific()

Read Delft3D FM specific model attributes.

cosmos.cosmos_delft3dfm.CoSMoS_Delft3DFM.pre_process()

Preprocess Delft3D FM model.

cosmos.cosmos_delft3dfm.CoSMoS_Delft3DFM.move()

Move Delft3D FM model input, output, and restart files.

cosmos.cosmos_delft3dfm.CoSMoS_Delft3DFM.post_process()

Post-process Delft3D FM output: generate wave and water level timeseries.

cosmos.cosmos_hurrywave.CoSMoS_HurryWave.read_model_specific()

Read HurryWave specific model attributes.

cosmos.cosmos_hurrywave.CoSMoS_HurryWave.pre_process()

Preprocess HurryWave model.

cosmos.cosmos_hurrywave.CoSMoS_HurryWave.move()

Move HurryWave model input, output, and restart files.

cosmos.cosmos_hurrywave.CoSMoS_HurryWave.post_process()

Post-process HurryWave output: generate (probabilistic) wave timeseries and maps.

cosmos.cosmos_xbeach.CoSMoS_XBeach.read_model_specific()

Read XBeach specific model attributes.

cosmos.cosmos_xbeach.CoSMoS_XBeach.pre_process()

Preprocess XBeach model.

cosmos.cosmos_xbeach.CoSMoS_XBeach.move()

Move XBeach model input and output files.

cosmos.cosmos_xbeach.CoSMoS_XBeach.post_process()

Post-process XBeach output: generate sedimentation/erosion maps.

Other functions¶

cosmos.cosmos_configuration.Configuration.set(…)

Set CoSMoS configuration settings.
